Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.GameSave

Class FlatFileManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.miniproyecto4.model.GameSave.FlatFileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFlatFileManager
public class FlatFileManager extends Object implements IFlatFileManager
Manages flat file operations for storing and retrieving player data. Implements simple text-based persistence for player information.

  • Method Details

    • savePlayerData

      public void savePlayerData(String nickname, int sunkShips)
      Saves player data to a flat file. Writes the player's nickname and number of sunk ships to a text file.
      Specified by:
      savePlayerData in interface IFlatFileManager
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname
      sunkShips - the number of ships the player has sunk

    • loadPlayerData

      public String[] loadPlayerData()
      Loads player data from the flat file. Reads the player's nickname and number of sunk ships from the text file.
      Specified by:
      loadPlayerData in interface IFlatFileManager
      Returns:
      an array containing the nickname at index 0 and sunk ships count at index 1, or null if the file cannot be read

    • deletePlayerData

      public void deletePlayerData()
      Deletes the player data file if it exists. Removes all stored player information from the file system.
      Specified by:
      deletePlayerData in interface IFlatFileManager
